citing_paper_authors: Anders, Søgaard | Jonas, Kuhn
raw_text: The empirical adequacy of synchronous context-free grammars of rank two (2-SCFGs) (Satta and Peserico, 2005), used in syntax based machine translation systems such as Wu (1997), Zhang et al (2006) and Chiang (2007), in terms of what alignments they induce, has been discussed in Wu (1997) and Wellington et al (2006), but with a one-sided focus on so-called? inside-out alignments?
clean_text: The empirical adequacy of synchronous context-free grammars of rank two (2-SCFGs) (Satta and Peserico, 2005), used in syntax based machine translation systems such as Wu (1997), Zhang et al (2006) and Chiang (2007), in terms of what alignments they induce, has been discussed in Wu (1997) and Wellington et al (2006), but with a one-sided focus on so-called inside-out alignments.
